### New features
#### Improved item linking Introducing improved support for item linking (paired items). Item linking is a key concept in the n8n data flow. Learn more in [Data item linking](/data/data-mapping/data-item-linking/index.md).
#### Overhauled built-in variables n8n's [built-in methods and variables](/code/index.md) have been overhauled, introducing new variables, and providing greater consistency in behavior and naming.
#### Redesigned main navigation We've redesigned the main navigation (the left hand menu) to create a simpler user experience.
#### Other new features * Improved error text when loading options in a node. * On reset, share unshared credentials with the instance owner.
